name: Melissa Koser's Dryer Sheets
comments: I like to keep a dark sock to throw in with the light load
ingredients: 1 cup vinegar (do *not* use apple cider vinegar)
2/3 cup hair conditioner (cheap stuff is fine)
old, mismatched sock you won't be needing
instructions: Mix ingredients (do not shake; will cause foaming). Keep sock in container with conditioner until ready to use, then wring until slightly damp. Throw into dryer with clothes and turn on dryer.
